dataList.content: The Sinners were fatigued and damaged, some already dead.
As opposed to us, Kromer still stands triumphantly. She reaches for the inside of Sinclair’s coat in what seems like a declaration of his fate.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Now then, it’s time, Sinclair.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I’ll be taking the second coin… your last chance.
Why are you… doing this to me…
Why… me…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Sinclair, do you wanna know why I gave you back the basement key when you asked?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Listen close. It’s not because I’d made my discovery or baked a copy of it.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: It’s because you were my key.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You see, I happen to know of a way to take a peek at the futures that might come true.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I saw one among them where you and I travel from Nest to Nest, slaughtering heretics together all around the City.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Even though you were raised by heretics bearing revolting metal bodies…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Part of you still felt disgusted by them. Funny, isn’t it?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You would stab them in the head with your halberd!
D-Don’t you lie to me…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: While I smash their heads with a hammer!
Stop it…!

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Ahaha… In that world, you looked like the freest person in the universe, transcending everything.
No…
You’re lying!!!

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Whether I’m lying or not…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Ufu.
Kromer suddenly cracked a wry laugh and stopped moving.
<The Golden Bough…!>
The Golden Bough on the altar resonated with her cackle, and began to glow brighter.
Then…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Aah…! It’s begun… At last, my final grudge will be fulfilled!
A mass of flesh engulfs her lower half.
From the hideous organic growth, bundles of ambiguous appendages stretch outward in countless numbers.
As if desire and madness were made manifest…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Come… Sinclair.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Rip me up and chew me down.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: If you can, that is… Keheh.
